content.text: KUALA LUMPUR : The prosecution has filed an application to transfer the case involving Datuk Seri Najib Tun Razak and Arul Kanda Kandasamy over the alleged tampering of 1MDB 's final audit report to the High Court . Deputy public prosecutor Amir Nasrudin informed Sessions Court judge Azura Alwi this when the case came up for mention yesterday . " We request for a mention date after we are notified of the High Court 's decision on the application , " he said . When met later , DPP Amir said it was filed yesterday but the High Court has not fixed a date to hear the application . He said the prosecution had handed over 26 sets of case-related documents to the defence . At the proceedings , lawyer Muhammad Farhan Muhammad Shafee represented Najib , 66 , while Datuk N. Sivananthan acted on behalf of Arul Kanda , 43 .
